Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of a light-brown pottery wine-jar, the fabric is grey in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393521) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393521)
